trans-unit.source: You’re perceptive and well aware of your surroundings. You notice the little details and remember them. You can be difficult to surprise.
trans-unit.target: You’re perceptive and well aware of your surroundings. You notice the little details and remember them. You can be difficult to surprise.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in initiative actions.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in initiative actions.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in perception actions.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in perception actions.

trans-unit.source: Find the Flaw: If an opponent has a straightforward weakness (takes extra damage from fire, can’t see out of their left eye, and so on), the GM will tell you what it is.
trans-unit.target: Find the Flaw: If an opponent has a straightforward weakness (takes extra damage from fire, can’t see out of their left eye, and so on), the GM will tell you what it is.

trans-unit.source: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.
trans-unit.target: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

trans-unit.source: You heard about what was going on, saw a flaw in the other PCs’ plan, and joined up to help them out.
trans-unit.target: You heard about what was going on, saw a flaw in the other PCs’ plan, and joined up to help them out.

trans-unit.source: You noticed that the PCs have a foe (or at least a tail) they weren’t aware of.
trans-unit.target: You noticed that the PCs have a foe (or at least a tail) they weren’t aware of.

trans-unit.source: You saw that the other PCs were up to something interesting and got involved.
trans-unit.target: You saw that the other PCs were up to something interesting and got involved.

trans-unit.source: You’ve been noticing some strange things going on, and this all appears related.
trans-unit.target: You’ve been noticing some strange things going on, and this all appears related.
